item.title: His Name Was King
item.description: His Name Was King is a 1971 Italian Western film directed by Giancarlo Romitelli and starring Klaus Kinski.

item.title: Return of Shanghai Joe
item.description: Return of Shanghai Joe is a 1975 Western film directed by Bitto Albertini and starring Klaus Kinski.

item.title: Arizona Colt
item.description: Arizona Colt, also known as The Man from Nowhere, is a Spaghetti Western directed by Michele Lupo and starring Giuliano Gemma, Fernando Sancho and Corinne Marchand.

item.title: For One Thousand Dollars Per Day
item.description: For One Thousand Dollars Per Day is a 1966 Italian-Spanish Spaghetti Western film directed by Silvio Amadio. The title song ""My Gun is Fast" is performed by Bobby Solo.

item.title: California
item.description: California is a 1977 Italo-Spanish spaghetti western film directed by Michele Lupo. The film was generally well received by critics and obtained a good commercial success at Italian box office.

item.title: Gunman Sent by God
item.description: Gunman Sent by God is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Giorgio Ferroni and starring Anthony Steffen.

item.title: Halleluja for Django
item.description: La più grande rapina del West is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Maurizio Lucidi.

item.title: Oklahoma John
item.description: Oklahoma John also known as Ranch of the Ruthless or The Man from Oklahoma is a Spanish, German and 1965 Italian international co-production western film directed by Jaime Jesús Balcázar and Roberto Bianchi Montero.

item.title: The Big Gundown
item.description: The Big Gundown is a Spaghetti Western film directed by Sergio Sollima, and starring Lee Van Cleef and Tomas Milian.

item.title: Lola Colt
item.description: Lola Colt is a 1967 Spaghetti Western film directed by Siro Marcellini.
